FuncDef: The display mpls te ds-te te-class-mapping command displays DiffServ-aware Traffic Engineering (DS-TE) TE-class mapping table information.
CLIs: display mpls te ds-te te-class-mapping default
display mpls te ds-te te-class-mapping config
display mpls te ds-te te-class-mapping verbose

ParaDef.Info:
Display configured TE-Class-Mapping.
Display configured TE-Class-Mapping

Display detail information of TE-Class-Mapping.
Display detail information of TE-Class-Mapping

Display default TE-Class-Mapping.
Display default TE-Class-Mapping

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te ds-te te-class-mapping config
TE-Class ID         Class Type     Priority       Description
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls te ds-te te-class-mapping command displays DiffServ-aware Traffic Engineering (DS-TE) TE-class mapping table information.
